summary: The module provides CDK stack definitions used in integration tests to verify HTTPS enforcement on Amazon Elasticsearch Service domains. It includes a non‑compliant stack that omits HTTPS enforcement and a compliant stack that enables HTTPS and demonstrates persisting a simple stack data structure in an Elasticsearch index.
business_intent: To ensure security best practices by testing that Elasticsearch domains are configured to require HTTPS, and to showcase a practical use case of storing application data in Elasticsearch within an infrastructure‑as‑code workflow.
